overview: Count Massimo, who is always broke, helped by his secretary, Quinto, tries to open a nightclub. Nymphomaniac dancers Yvette and Yvonne, choreographed by Gianluca, are intended to be the main attraction. The venture fails, but a billionaire, Laura, proposes marriage to the count, attracted by his title. Massimo is saved from marriage and financial ruin by an unexpected inheritance from a rich American uncle. However, a condition of the will is that he looks after two young, female and sexy American cousins.
title: Attenti a quelle due... ninfomani
